title: Button, late 18th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Circular medallion in the style of Wedgewood Jasperware; showing open flower with eight petals surrounded by ring of dots; blue on white ground. Central hole.

On card 4

tombstone.epitaph:
Button, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Stoneware. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1925-2-13.
